trigger: CONCLUSIONS : Our results establish that <extra_id_0> PI 3-kinase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> can both positively and negatively regulate T-cell function , and uncover a previously unrecognized function for <extra_id_0> PI 3-kinase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in T cells as a selective negative regulator of TCR-signalling events and therefore as a determinant of T-cell homeostasis .

CONCLUSIONS : Our results establish that PI 3-kinase can both positively and negatively regulate T-cell function , and uncover a previously unrecognized function for PI 3-kinase in T cells as a selective negative regulator of TCR-signalling events and therefore as a determinant of T-cell homeostasis .
